definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: young man Is 62:5 + 7 t.; pl. [[בַּחוּרִים]] (intensive with dag. f. implic.) Pr 20:29 + 13 t.; cstr. [[בַּחוּרֵי]] Ez Eze 23:6 + 4 t.; sf. [[בַּחוּרַי]] etc. La 1:18 + 16 t.;—young man (choice, in the prime of manhood) 1Sa 9:2, Ec 11:9, Is 62:5; coll. young men Je 15:8; [[בָּחוּר וּבְתוּלָה]] young men and virgins De 32:25, 2Ch 36:17, Je 51:22, Ez Eze 9:6; usually pl. Ju Jdg 14:10, Ru 3:10, 1Sa 8:16, 2Ki 8:12, 2Ch 36:17, Pr 20:29, Is 9:17, Is 31:8, Is 40:30, Je 6:11, Je 9:20, Je 11:22, Je 18:21, Je 48:15, Je 49:26, Je 50:3, Je 51:3, La 1:15, La 5:13, La 5:14, Ez Eze 33:6, Eze 33:12, Eze 33:23, Eze 30:17, Joe 3:1, Am 2:11, Am 4:10; ‖[[בתולות]] Ps 78:63, Ps 148:12, Is 23:4, Je 31:13, La 1:18, La 2:21, Am 8:13, Zec 9:17.
